summary: Implements an integration feature that enriches Checkov scans with policy metadata from Bridgecrew, handling ID translation, customer‑specific overrides, and exposing helpers to retrieve benchmark, category, severity and title information. It also provides lifecycle hooks that run before and after scans and runners.
business_intent: Enable Checkov to align its findings with Bridgecrew policy definitions, allowing users to see standardized policy attributes and apply custom mappings, thereby improving reporting, compliance tracking, and severity handling across scans.
